long_description: Slip them on for race day or training! The Pepper's Richochet polarized sunglasses provide wrap-around protection from the sun. Triacetate polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Grilamid(TM) lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures, and are extremely impact resistant. Rubber nose pads and temple tips grip during exercise and hot weather for a secure fit. Shatterproof lenses provide 100% UV protection. Sized to fit medium faces.
